description.en: Increases Max HP by + 300 for 1 hour. Once expired, it becomes a Flowerpot of Love.
description.ar: Increases Max HP by + 300 for 1 hour. Once expired, it becomes a Flowerpot of Love.
description.br: Aumenta a vida máxima (HP) em 300 por 1 hora. Uma vez expirado, se torna um Vaso de Flores do Amor
description.cns: 最大生命值增加300点，持续 1 小时。 一旦过期，它就变成了一个爱的花钵。
description.de: Erhöht deine HP um +300 für eine Stunde. Sobald es abgelaufen ist, verwandelt es sich in einen Flowerpot of Love.
description.fi: Increases Max HP by + 300 for 1 hour. Once expired, it becomes a Flowerpot of Love.
description.fil: Increases Max HP by + 300 for 1 hour. Once expired, it becomes a Flowerpot of Love.
description.fr: PV max +300 (1h). Se transforme ensuite en Plante tenace.
description.id: Meningkatkan Max HP sebesar + 300 selama 1 jam. Setelah kedaluwarsa, itu menjadi Flowerpot of Love.
description.it: Increases Max HP by + 300 for 1 hour. Once expired, it becomes a Flowerpot of Love.
description.jp: 1時間、最大HPが+300増加します。使用後は恩恵の植木鉢になります。
description.kr: 1시간 동안 최대 체력이 +300 증가합니다. 유통기한이 끝나면 은혜의 화분이 됩니다.
description.nl: Increases Max HP by + 300 for 1 hour. Once expired, it becomes a Flowerpot of Love.
description.pl: Increases Max HP by + 300 for 1 hour. Once expired, it becomes a Flowerpot of Love.
description.ru: Increases Max HP by + 300 for 1 hour. Once expired, it becomes a Flowerpot of Love.
description.sp: Aumenta la Máx. HP en + 300 durante 1 hora. Cuando expira, se convierte en una Maceta de Amor.
description.sw: Increases Max HP by + 300 for 1 hour. Once expired, it becomes a Flowerpot of Love.
description.th: เพิ่ม Max HP ขึ้น +300 เป็นเวลา 1 ชั่วโมง เมื่อหมดอายุจะกลายเป็นFlowerpot of Love
description.tw: 最大上限HP+300，持續1小時，時間一到將會變成愛情盆栽
description.vi: Tăng HP tối đa + 300 trong 1 giờ. Sau khi hết hạn, nó sẽ trở thành Lọ hoa Tình yêu.
